name: Tato - Potato
description:
Experience a day in the life of Tato. She really loves fresh potato.
And chips even more!

Controls

Use either a controller (recommended) or a mouse.

Ludum Dare

Make sure to post a screenshot of your personal best in the Ludum Dare comment section and make the Ludum Dare community high score yours! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/tato-potato

Source Code

You can find the full unity project here: https://github.com/NoelWidmer/TatoPotato
